code: import axios from'axios';var baseURL='https://naomi-be-news.herokuapp.com/api';export var getAllArticles=function getAllArticles(topicName,authorName,sort_by,order){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/articles"),{params:{topic:topicName,author:authorName,sort_by:sort_by,order:order}});};export var getSingleArticle=function getSingleArticle(article_id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/articles/").concat(article_id));};export var getComments=function getComments(article_id,sort_by,order){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/articles/").concat(article_id,"/comments"),{params:{sort_by:sort_by,order:order}});};export var updateCommentVotes=function updateCommentVotes(comment_id,number){return axios.patch("".concat(baseURL,"/comments/").concat(comment_id),{inc_votes:number});};export var updateArticleVotes=function updateArticleVotes(article_id,number){return axios.patch("".concat(baseURL,"/articles/").concat(article_id),{inc_votes:number});};export var getUser=function getUser(user_id){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/users/").concat(user_id));};export var getAllUsers=function getAllUsers(){return axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/users"));};export var addComment=function addComment(article_id,username,body){return axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/articles/").concat(article_id,"/comments"),{username:username,body:body});};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(comment_id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/comments/").concat(comment_id));};
